I'm Juan Isern

Hi, my name is Juan Isern and I'm a data scientist. I am currently working as a researcher at the University of Granada. Currently, I am mainly dedicated to artificial intelligence applied to image processing and computer vision. I work on large budget projects with international partners.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering and Business Administration. I always try to develop both professional profiles through data analysis and the generation of knowledge for the company. I am very motivated by the generation of reports for decision making through data visualization techniques, as well as data mining and the implementation of business models through machine learning.

If you want to know more about me or my projects, explore this website.

Work experience

These are some places I have been working at:

  • University of Granada

    April 2019 - Today

    Data scientist: Researcher in the Department of Architecture and Computer Technology for the project "From the cloud to the edge - smart Integration and OPtimisation Technologies for highly efficient Image and VIdeo processing Systems" (FITOPTIVIS)

  • University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria

    June 2018 - August 2018

    Data scientist: Collaboration grant in project "Strategic Plan 2025 of the Municipality of La Aldea de San Nicolás: Situation diagnosis". Conducted text mining analyses of the topics treated in sustainability reports. Use of different sets of natural language processing (NLP) tools, resulting a new methodology useful for future similar analyses.

  • Loquat Solutions

    September 2017 - February 2018

    Software engineer: Participated in installing scalable information system for the regional government of Canary Islands. Design of modules for accounting and stock management present in commercial software. Assisted in product research and competition analysis: identifying and defining markets, product market and geographic market.
